channel.title: [637] Nexus | Torva | Full Nex | Source | Aura's [MUST SEE!]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Note: I didn't have time to make pic's, i added FULL Nex, fixed some bugs/glitches and 2 dupe's. Added some other skills to the skill area. Working on Aura's, they give boosts etc., but need to add more aura's.[/size]
So yea, was hosting this for a while. VPS went down. Not hosting anymore. Thought I'd release.
Comment and REP if you like it. Thanks, Enjoy.
EDIT: LINK RE-ADDED Source Download: [url=http://www.gratiswalliecard.nl/kliklinks-id-41187.html]Nexus Server.rar[/url]
EDIT: Client Files have been UN-Hidden! Have Fun Guys! Client Download: [url=http://www.gratiswalliecard.nl/kliklinks-id-41187.html]Nexus 639 Client.rar[/url]
Here's some pics too: [img]http://eclipse639.com/home.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/homeshops.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/puro.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/portal.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/huntshop.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/skills.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/corppwnage.png[/img] [img]http://eclipse639.com/nex.png[/img]
Have Fun
Credits: Dementhium Team Others Me
